casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. MICHAEL J. MACKENZIE, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 4864 DATED this 18th day of March, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten (10) years imposed on September 27, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes.
